title: 66 Voice Commerce Platforms in the Restaurant and Hospitality Industry
description: Host Paul Barron sits down with Anmol Oberoi, the chief executive officer of Emitrr. The platform offers businesses the opportunity to create and publish storefront apps on Alexa and Google Home. Barron and Oberoi explore voice adoption concerns and the possibilities for voice command interfaces in the restaurant and hospitality industry.
